description: "A map of the China Sea between Malaya, Sumatra and Borneo. The numbers indicate sea depth (bathymetry), and there are drawings of the side views of some of the islands (elevations), both used to aide navigation. Some maritime routes are also marked."
label: "The East India Islands : comprehending the Isles of Sunda, the Moluccas and the Philippine Islands / by Samuel Dunn."
